// Takes integrated density measurements at every ROI on every slice and outputs to a csv file
// Works well with Circle Pro tool 
// Install permanently by saving this text file in the ImageJ\macros\toolsets folder
// Click the >> button on the tool bar and then select IntDenCSV 
// Created by Ben 1  

macro "IntDenCSV Tool - "{

run("Set Measurements...", "decimal=3");
run("Clear Results");
for(j = 1; j <= nSlices; j++){
setSlice(j);
	for (i = 0; i<roiManager("count"); i++) {
		roiManager("select", i)
		IntDen= getValue("IntDen");
		setResult("Chamber "+(i+1)+" IntDen", j-1, IntDen);
		if (IntDen > 65534) {
			Dialog.createNonBlocking("Congratulations");  
			Dialog.addMessage("You maxed out the camera");
			Dialog.show();
}
}

path = getDirectory("Select a Directory");
	
getDateAndTime(year, month, dayOfWeek, dayOfMonth, hour, minute, second, msec);
time = "";
time = time +year;
if (month<10) {time= time+"0";}
time = time + month+1+"";
if (dayOfMonth<10) {time= time+"0";}
time = time +dayOfMonth+"_";
if (hour<10) {time= time+"0";}
time = time +hour+".";
if (minute<10) {time= time+"0";}
time = time +minute+"_";
saveAs("Results", path+time+"IntDen"+".csv");

Dialog.createNonBlocking("Message");  
Dialog.addMessage("Finished");
	Dialog.show();
}
